title: The Tishchenko reaction mediated by organo-f-complexes: the myths and obstacles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17901-17928
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01824A, Review Article

Aditya L. Shinde, Moris S. Eisen, Tapas Ghatak
For over a century, the Tishchenko reaction has been a valuable technique for synthesizing esters from aldehydes, serving a variety of applications in different domains.
